Joshua or Josue__13.1__Josue was old, and far advanced in ye: : He was then about one hundred and one years old.-- And there is a very large country left.
Joshua or Josue__13.1__Which is not yet divided by lot: : Not yet possessed by the children of Israel.
Joshua or Josue__13.8__With whom: : That is, with the other half of that same tribe.
Joshua or Josue__13.21__The princes of Madian: : It appears from hence that these were subjects of king Sehon: they are said to have been slain with him, that is, about the same time, but not in the same battle.
